title: Jerry Jones, Michael Jordan, & the AFC West
itunes:title: Jerry Jones, Michael Jordan, & the AFC West
description:
Colin responds to Jerry Jones’ comments about Ezekiel Elliott, the NFL schedule, why Michael Jordan is still popular today, and his thoughts on the AFC West. Guests include Peter King, Greg Cosell, Stanford Routt, and Warren Sharp. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
